title: Changing schools: 1912-1985
creator_credit: Penny Robins and Penny Robins Video Projects
brief_description: Using archival footage this video raises a variety of issues relevant to contemporary educational debate in both Victoria and Australia at large. Topics addressed include the need for education to change, the role of government schools, equal educational opportunity, the integration of disabled children, Aboriginal education, multiculturalism and parent participation.
